apple_vendor_description: This emoji on Apple devices depicts a tender kiss between two individuals, a man with medium-light skin tone and a person with dark skin tone, rendered with Apple's signature soft, rounded edges and realistic lighting. The glossy finish on their cheeks and the gentle curve of their lips convey a sense of affection and intimacy, while the subtle shading adds depth and warmth. Itâ€™s a beautiful representation of love, romance, and connection, with each skin tone accurately and respectfully portrayed to symbolize diverse relationships.
